welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zion, where breathtaking natural beauty meets small-town charm. Known for its stunning national park and friendly locals, we invite you to immerse yourself in all that Zion has to offer and make unforgettable memories."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
